ygData.subject: Re: Minotaur Ribcage + C
ygData.msgSnippet: Pretty nice stuff, I know all our human and halfelf brethren would like that. Hey did you guys on the Cazik Thule server notice that the GMs took control of
ygData.messageBody:
Pretty nice stuff, I know all our human and halfelf brethren would like that.

Hey did you guys on the Cazik Thule server notice that the GMs took control
of the lizardmen in the Cazik Thule dungeon for 2 hours yesterday? They kept
speaking to me and right after I killed one another ran up and yelled, "You
killed my brother! Take this!"
Another said during the fight, "Hhahah! You fight like a halfling!"

The lizardmen were doing an organized attack which led me to believe they
were being controlled by an intelligent person and not the dumb AI. Plus they
kept saying the weirdest stuff at just the right moment (being attacked by a
barbarian, a lizard said "Ooo... big barbarian man can't kill little lizard!")
